      • createRMProxy

        @InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Unstable
public static <T> T createRMProxy(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration configuration,
                                                                       Class<T> protocol,
                                                                       org.apache.hadoop.security.UserGroupInformation user,
                                                                       org.apache.hadoop.security.token.Token<? extends org.apache.hadoop.security.token.TokenIdentifier> token)
                       throws IOException
        Create a proxy for the specified protocol.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type information of the proxy
        Parameters:
        configuration - Configuration to generate ClientRMProxy
        protocol - Protocol for the proxy
        user - the user on whose behalf the proxy is being created
        token - the auth token to use for connection
        Returns:
        Proxy to the RM
        Throws:
        IOException - on failure
